tool_description: Configures audio recording parameters including sample rate, bit depth, input sources, and buffer settings for optimal recording quality.

input_source.description: Audio input source type (microphone, line_in, usb_interface, xlr)

error_messages: Invalid sample rate: Use one of [44100, 48000, 96000, 192000] Hz.
Invalid bit depth: Use one of [16, 24, 32] bits.
Unsupported input source: Use one of [microphone, line_in, usb_interface, xlr].
usage: Specify sample_rate, bit_depth, and input_source to configure recording parameters. Use before starting any recording session.

configuration_id.description: Unique identifier for this audio configuration

buffer_size.description: Calculated optimal buffer size in samples
